Title: Checking In
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, John J. Gray (executive story editor), Crystal Liu (story editor), Todd Kubrak (staff writer)
Actors: Kathy Bates, Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters, Wes Bentley
Plot: A pair of foreign sisters check into the Hotel Cortez, while an L.A. detective investigates a brutal murder.
